Add one or multiple Google Accounts

1.	Open your device's Settings app. 
1.	Under "Accounts," touch Add account > Google Google. 
2.	Follow the instructions to add your account. 
3.	If needed, repeat steps to add multiple accounts.
Install or purchase app in Play Store

Install or purchase. 
1.	If you haven't already, add a Google account on your device. 
2.	Go to Google Play or open the Google Play Store app Google Play. 
3.	Select an item. 
4.	Touch Install (for free items) or the item's price. 
5.	Follow the on-screen instructions. For paid items, you can select or edit your payment method with the down arrow Down. If it's your first time making a purchase, your payment method will be added to your Google account.
How do I upload photos in Facebook?

To add and post photos to Facebook.
 
1.	Tap Photo at the top of your News Feed. 
2.	Choose photos from your android phone camera roll. 
3.	Tap Done. 
4.	If you want, you can: 
		1.	Tag friends 
		2.	Share what you are feeling or doing 
		3.	Add a location 
		4.	Choose an album 
		5.	Tap the photo to edit 
5.	Tap Post
Get Started with your Hangout app

Get Started with your Hangout app:
 
On your Android device, open the Hangouts app. 
1.	 At the bottom right, tap Compose. 
2.	 Tap New Conversation. 
3.	 Type the person name, and select them from the search results. 
4.	 Type your message, and tap Send. 

For Video Call: 
On your Android device, open the Hangouts app. 
1.	At the bottom right, tap Compose. 
2.	Tap New Video Call. 
3.	For each person in your video call, type their name and select them from the search results. 
4.	Tap Video call. 
5.	When you are done with your video call, you can leave by tapping End call Call end icon.
Open the Google Maps app maps

Open the Google Maps app maps.
 
1.	Search for your destination or tap it on the map. 
2.	In the bottom right, tap the blue circle. It will show a car, bus, bike, taxi, or person walking. 
3.	Choose one of the following: 
		1.	Driving: 
		2.	Transit: 
		3.	Walking: 
		4.	Rides: 
		5.	Cycling: 
4.	To see the list of driving, walking, or biking directions, tap the white bar at the bottom. It is the one that shows the travel time and distance.
How to post and delete a Tweet:

To post a Tweet:
 
1.	Tap on the Tweet compose icon. 
2.	Enter your message, and then tap Tweet. 
3.	A notification will appear in the status bar on your device and will go away once the Tweet successfully sends.


To @reply or mention an account:
 
1.	From your keyboard, tap the @ symbol and start typing. A drop down list of accounts you follow will appear. 
2.	As you type, the list will narrow down possible matches. 
3.	When the username you are looking for appears, tap it and it will be populated in the Tweet composer.


To delete a Tweet:
 
1.	Tap the Tweet you would like to delete, and then tap on the trash can icon 
2.	A message will pop-up with the option to cancel. Tap Delete Tweet. 
3.	A message will pop up with the option to proceed or cancel. Tap Yes to delete. The Tweet will be successfully removed from your profile.
